hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# hoards #a Bomb Bag#.
hinted_locations: Ganons Castle Water Trial Right Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #5# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the final reward from the #Frogs of Zora's River# is #the Biggoron Sword#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Lon Lon Ranch# is a foolish choice.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Broken Sword# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Hylian Shield#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Deku Tree Slingshot Room Side Chest

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Slingshot#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #0# major items.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #Din's Fire#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that shooting a #target in the woods# grants #the Eyeball Frog#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: Hi @, we've been trying to reach you about your horse's extended warranty.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a small #Fairy Fountain#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides a #Bow Shooting Gallery#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: I heard @ is pretty good at Zelda.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that dodging #rolling boulders in the Water Temple# leads to #a Deku Shield#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Purple Rupee#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #1# major item.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Recovery Heart#.
